content.raw:
Not sure if this is related or a known issue but the contact points are not always the closest so do not provide the correct range value:

![sonar_readings.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1240612719-sonar_readings.png)

Increasing the number of contact points worked for the box above but not for spheres or cylinders. So the correctness of the returned range reading is dependent on the geometry of mesh colliding with the sensor cone.
